attributes.action: if not already an offence, to make it illegal to not keep left on the motorway when there are no vehicles to overtake, and if it is already illegal to strictly enforce it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motorways are often slowed down by inconsiderate drivers not keeping to the left hand lane, this effectively cuts the motorways down to two lanes and slows everyones journey, we ask that this be made illegal if it is not already and if it is already illegal the police should strictly enforce it.
